title: A Quick and Easy Guide to Creating a Craigslist Account

steps.title: Enter your email on the Craigslist Signup page.
steps.content: Enter your email on the Craigslist Signup page . In the text box below the "Create an account" heading near the bottom of the page, type in the email address you want to use to create your Craigslist account. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click Create account.
steps.content: Click Create account . It's below the text box. Doing so sends a confirmation email to your specified email address.

steps.title: Open the email from Craigslist.
steps.content: Open the email from Craigslist. Head to your email inbox on a web browser or via its associated app on your phone or tablet. From there, click or tap the “craigslist account sign-up” email from sender "craigslist - automated message, do not reply" in your email's inbox.

steps.title: Click or tap the complete account sign-up button.
steps.content: Click or tap the complete account sign-up button. It should be under the text “to complete your craigslist account.”

steps.title: Create a password.
steps.content: Create a password. Type the password you want to use to log into your Craigslist account into the "new password" text box, then re-type the password into the "re-type new password" text box. Craigslist will tell you how strong your password is as you type it in. Alternative: Click or tap “Go Passwordless” for a password-free login experience with your Craigslist account.

steps.title: Click Change Password.
steps.content: Click Change Password . It's below the bottom text box. Doing so confirms your password and redirects the page.

steps.title: Click the Go to my account homepage link.
steps.content: Click the Go to my account homepage link. This takes you to your account page. You can now begin enjoying Craigslist as a registered user.

steps.title: Tap get started.
steps.content: Tap get started . This button sits at the bottom of the screen when you first open the app.

steps.title: Tap share location or not now.
steps.content: Tap share location or not now . Since Craigslist operates on region-based listings, the platform suggests sharing your location with the app. You don’t have to do this if you don’t want to, though. You’ll likely receive a pop-up from your phone asking if the app is allowed to use your location.

steps.title: Pick your starting location.
steps.content: Pick your starting location. Use the default location the app gives you, or type your location into the search bar to customize it.

steps.title: Tap Account and type in your email.
steps.content: Tap Account and type in your email. This will be the email associated with your Craigslist account.

steps.title: Tap the send me a link option.
steps.content: Tap the send me a link option. Craigslist will send a link to your email that’ll allow you to create a new account.

steps.title: Tap the complete account sign-up button in your email.
steps.content: Tap the complete account sign-up button in your email. This will redirect you back to the Craigslist app, though your device may ask for permission to open it in a different application first.

steps.title: Tap either set password or skip password.
steps.content: Tap either set password or skip password . You can either set a password for your account or go password-less. Set password: Type in a secure password and hit “set password.” Skip password: Get redirected to the next screen.

steps.title: Accept the terms of use.
steps.content: Accept the terms of use. Tap “I ACCEPT” to continue using the app with your new account.
